KeCert Configurator

Discover the New

In the constantly evolving world of digital education, blockchain certificates represent a groundbreaking change.

Thanks to innovative solutions like KeCert®, provided by Kedos S.r.l., it is now possible to certify diplomas and certificates securely, transparently, and verifiably, without the need for intermediaries.

Blockchain is a shared and immutable digital ledger, ideal for safeguarding valuable data such as degrees, credentials, and certifications. Each certificate becomes a unique digital token, timestamped and encrypted, ensuring authenticity and preventing fraud.

Customize your software for issuing blockchain certificates. Choose the features you need, compare the options, and create the perfect solution for your business.

What is Blockchain?

Blockchain is a public, shared, and immutable ledger in which each transaction corresponds to the writing of a new block in the chain.

Each block contains both the information to be recorded and the date and time of the transaction. A new block is appended at the end of the chain, with no possibility of altering existing blocks or inserting a block between two consecutive ones...

More Information

The Advantages of KeCert®

Advanced Security

Each certificate is tracked on Ethereum, based on the Blockcerts standard developed by MIT, to which Kedos actively contributes.

Instant Verification

Students, institutions, and recruiters can authenticate diplomas with one click, no intermediaries.

Complete Control

The training institution retains ownership of the information throughout the entire certificate lifecycle.

Efficiency & Savings

The process is fast and streamlined, with low costs and long-term digital storage.

Total Flexibility

Use it anywhere: from your CV to LinkedIn, from recruiting platforms to international universities.

Offer Information 1 Course

With this offer, you can validate the certificates issued by your institution for a single course, with no limit on the number of enrolled students.

Practical example:

A Higher Technical Institute (ITS) can certify the diplomas of an unlimited number of students BUT only for a single course, such as Web Developer, Software Developer or any other course offered by the school.

Offer Information 10 Courses

With this offer, you can validate the certificates issued by your institution for up to 10 different courses, with a total limit of 30 students.

Practical example:

A Higher Technical Institute (ITS) can certify the diplomas of up to 30 students, distributed across one or more courses (up to 10), such as Web Developer, Software Developer or other courses offered by the school.

Offer Information 50 Courses

With this offer, you can validate the certificates issued by your institution for up to 50 different courses, with a total limit of 30 students.

Practical example:

A Higher Technical Institute (ITS) can certify the diplomas of up to 30 students, distributed across one or more courses (up to 50), such as Web Developer, Software Developer or other courses offered by the school.
